name: palimpsest
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a very old text or document in which writing has been removed and covered or replaced by new writing
formal something such as a work of art that has many levels of meaning, types of style, etc. that build on each other: His performance is a palimpsest in which you see all the layers of a single life.
